backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented game features (UI layout, state machine, movement detection, progress bar, elimination) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to one-sentence descriptions summarizing each file's purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base import with CSS custom property tokens for light and dark shadcn UI themes covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'Squid Game: Red Light, Green Light' that mounts the React app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wires together all game hooks and UI components, managing sensitivity state, movement score, phase-based background glow/border styling, and conditional rendering of idle/active/eliminated/won screens.
frontend/src/components/CountdownDisplay: Displays an animated 3-2-1 countdown with a key-triggered pop-in animation and Bebas Neue cinematic typography.
frontend/src/components/EliminatedScreen: Elimination result screen showing final progress percentage, survival time, a red progress bar, and a styled 'Try Again' button.
frontend/src/components/GameCanvas.tsx: Renders the webcam feed onto a canvas via useWebcam and useMovementDetection hooks, with overlays for camera requesting, error, and standby states.
frontend/src/components/IdleScreen.tsx: Welcome screen displaying the game title, color-coded instructions for green/red light rules, and a styled 'Start Game' button with camera access notice.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Renders a styled progress bar with color changes based on game phase (green/red/pink), milestone markers, and a shine effect.
frontend/src/components/SensitivitySlide: A range input slider for adjusting movement detection sensitivity, displaying a labeled difficulty level (FORGIVING to BRUTAL) based on the current value.
frontend/src/components/StatusText.tsx: Displays animated 'GREEN LIGHT' or 'RED LIGHT' status text with appropriate colors and sub-labels based on the current game phase.
frontend/src/components/Timer.tsx: Formats and displays a time value (in seconds) as a styled countdown/elapsed timer with minutes, seconds, and tenths.
frontend/src/components/WonScreen.tsx: Victory screen shown when the player reaches 100% progress, displaying final time, a full progress bar, and a 'Play Again' button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Core game logic hook managing phase transitions (idle, countdown, green-light, red-light, eliminated, won), progress tracking, survival timer, and audio cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, handling login, logout, and identity persistence via DFINITY's AuthClient.
Uses requestAnimationFrame to compare consecutive webcam frames pixel-by-pixel, computing a smoothed movement score for motion detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebcam.ts: Manages webcam stream lifecycleâ€”requesting access, attaching the stream to a video element, and cleaning up tracks on unmount.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives, imports Google Fonts, defines CSS custom properties for the dark Squid Game aesthetic (pink/red/green accents), and declares utility classes and keyframe animations used throughout the game UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/audioEffects.ts: Procedurally generates all game sound effects (green light chime, red light alarm, elimination screech) using the Web Audio API with no external audio files.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with game-specific colors, fonts (Bebas Neue, Inter), glow box-shadows, and OKLCH-based design tokens; includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current build state, architectural decisions, implemented features, and known issues for a Squid Game-themed Red Light/Green Light browser game built with React, MediaPipe, and Web Audio API.
